message: What's the backstory on it? haha
It would be cool to be able to "ignore" a topic so that you would no longer see when it's updated and not see it listed in your daily emails.
I'd actually love any UX suggestions y'all might have for Convore.  None of us on the team are UX/IA experts, but we recognize its importance.
It's pretty nice, actually. You have the same problems most chat systems have (vertical scroll)
The group's frontpage summary is pretty nice, and the daily emails, while a tad annoying, are a really nice way to keep up.
<secrets>I'm working on that as we speak</secrets> :)
We don't embed YouTube videos yet
Someone posted a link to Digital Underground's "Humpty Dance" and it's been in my head all day. They also sang "Freaks of the Industry".
